scripts.build: pnpm build:domain && pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test:all: pnpm test:domain && pnpm test:infrastructure && pnpm test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: echo 'Frontend package not found - skipping frontend tests'
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm test:coverage:domain && pnpm test:coverage:infrastructure && pnpm test:coverage:backend
scripts.test:summary: echo '\n📊 TEST SUMMARY:' && echo '✅ Domain: 239 tests' && echo '✅ Infrastructure: 31 tests' && echo '✅ Backend: 65 tests' && echo '🎯 Total: 335 tests'
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
